help_entry.name: difference
help_entry.description: Returns difference of the values of expr1 and expr2

parameters.parameter: expr1: The expression to subtract from

help_entry.return: The difference of expr1 and expr2

help_entry.name: minus
help_entry.description: Returns negative of the values of expr

parameters.parameter: expr: The first expression to negate

help_entry.return: negative of the value of expr

help_entry.name: product
help_entry.description: Returns product of the values of expr1 and expr2

parameters.parameter: expr1: The first expression to multiply
expr2: The second expression to multiply

help_entry.return: The product of the values of expr1 and expr2

help_entry.name: quotient
help_entry.description: Returns quotient of the values of expr1 and expr2
help_entry.return: The quotient of the values of expr1 and expr2

help_entry.name: random
help_entry.description: Returns random non-negative number strictly less than max
help_entry.return: random non-negative number strictly less than max

help_entry.name: sum
help_entry.description: Returns sum of the values of expr1 and expr2

parameters.parameter: expr1: The first expression to sum
expr2: The second expression to sum

help_entry.return: The sum of expr1 and expr2
